mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1998 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1998 season of the Barter Theatre. Artistic Director: Richard Rose. Programs: Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, March 5- April 3, Sponsored by Eastman | Shepherd!, April 1-11, Sponsored by King Pharmaceuticals | All I Really Need to Know I Learned in Kindergarten: A musical adaptation of the stories of Robert Fulghum, April 8-16, Sponsored by Sprint | Diaries of Adam and Eve by Mark Twain, Starring David Birney and Harriet Hall, May 20- June 14, Sponsored by Camberley's Martha Washington Inn | Fiddler on the Roof, June 18-Aug 23, Sponsored by Lebanon Apparel | Tartuffe by Molier√©, July 1- Aug 22, Sponsored by Nationsbank and Virginia Chamber of Commerce | Sylvia, June 23-Aug 29, Sponsored by US Airways | Almost like Being in Love: A musical revue of the songs of Alan J. Lerner, July 2-30, Sponsored by US Airways | WMKS: The Christmas Show- 1942, Nov 19- Dec 27, Sponsored by Columbus McKinnon.
